articles.author: CT Contributor
articles.title: India vs Australia fourth T20I in Raipur was organised using generators and power backups costing INR 1.4 crore - Crictoday.com (Cricket News)
articles.description: The Chhattisgarh State Cricket Sangh brought generators, costing INR 1.4 crore. India won the match by 20 runs to clinch the series.
articles.content:
The fourth T20I between Australia and India in Raipur was organised under emergency lights on December 1, Friday.
The contest at Shaheed Veer Narayan Singh International Stadium was under the scanne… [+827 chars]
